deprecatedhttp://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/utg-concept-properties#v2-table-deprecatedcodeVersion of HL7 in which the code was deprecated

This code system http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-0189 defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
H Hispanic or LatinoHispanic or Latino
N Not Hispanic or LatinoNot Hispanic or Latino
U UnknownUnknown

name: EthnicGroup
title: ethnicGroup
description: Code system of concepts further defining a patient's ancestry.  In the US, a current use is to use these codes to report ethnicity in line with US federal standards for Hispanic origin.  Used for HL7 Version 2 messaging in the PID segment.
purpose: Underlying Master Code System for V2 table 0189 (Ethnic Group)
copyright: Copyright HL7. Licensed under creative commons public domain

property.description: Version of HL7 in which the code was deprecated
